title: Ford 8N Tractor  Changing Transmission Hydraulic Fluid

tasks.task: Hydraulic fluid change on a 1949 8N tractor
subtasks: Inspect drain bolt locations
Remove bolt to drain hydraulic fluid
Catch drained fluid in bucket
Identify and use appropriate socket size
Check fluid level against capacity (five gallons)
Open filler cap for fluid addition
Pour replacement fluid into tractor (starting from a three-gallon bucket)
Monitor fluid level via dipstick
Verify fluid level meets specifications
Secure filler cap
Start tractor to test fluid hold
